name: Interrogation 091
description:
A short horror/mystery game where you are being interrogated. The game takes place in an interrogation room, and you the player are being asked weird questions. As you stay inside the interrogation room, something weird happens. Are you really being interrogated at all?

The concept of this game is inspired by Sentient and is open for interpretation.

This game was created in 2 days for a 3 days game jam! If you liked the game, consider rating it :)
